name: projects/560805672913/locations/europe-west3/instances/3e220ed9-5c8d-42db-a940-1880ad360566/rules/ru_99491a1c-19b9-4165-9d36-11b0a903c249
text:
rule Compromised_Credentials_alerts {
  meta:
    author = "TCS MDR practice"
    description = "Mandiant DTM Compromised Credential"
    severity = "Medium"
  events:
    $dtm.extracted.fields["alert_type"] != "Compromised Credentials"
    $dtm.extracted.fields["severity"] = "high" OR $dtm.extracted.fields["severity"] = "medium"
  outcome:
    $alert_type = $dtm.extracted.fields["alert_type"]
    $log_type = $dtm.metadata.log_type
    $confidence_score = $dtm.extracted.fields["confidence"]
    $action = array($dtm.security_result.action)
    $discovered_domain = array($dtm.extracted.fields["topics[0].value"])
  condition:
    $dtm
}
author: TCS MDR practice
